nodes.text: Okay, Conner - what can you tell me about the test?

options.text: Say Something Polite to Help Sosi

nodes.text: I'm sure that the Master will be resetting the trap with a different key, but it's probably going to be a six letter word.
Is that all the help you can give me?
Don't worry - you'll do fine. Just be your normal charming self to Master von Urwald and figure the answer will be a word he'd use to describe you.
After all, the Master has a very strong opinion of you. You won't disappoint him.
I never thought I would.
Some help you are.

options.text: Say Something Clever to Flatter Sosi

nodes.text: I don't know what the answer to your test will be, but think of it as a game of wits against the Master.
He's going to go out of his way to trick you. You just have to outthink him.
With your brains, you'll have no trouble outsmarting the Master at his own game.
After all, surely the Master can't outwit you!

options.text: Say Something Snarky to Give Sosi Confidence

nodes.text: You don't need my help to crack that safe. You've got the brains and the skill to do it on your own.
You won't let anyone or anything get the better of you - Particularly not Master von Urwald and his test.
You are correct. I am the best.
Of course, I won't fail this test. I merely wanted to increase my score.
The test took you long enough - did you fail miserably or just barely disarm the trap before you set it off?

nodes.commentor: xxx Need logical benefits from the checks below, or just to remove them.

nodes.message: Simply augments improvement to the particular stat.

nodes.text: What's the matter, Sosi - are you worried about the trap since you don't have a minion to disarm it for you?
It will be hard for you to cheat with the Master watching your every move.
So much for your delusion of being the Rogue of the Year. You aren't even a Rogue of the Day.
Sosi, Sosi, Sosi. <shakes head> You sound so hostile. And here I made up this little ditty just for you...

Poor sweet Sosi so distressed
When Caesari faced a test
Even Sosi with all his charm
Cannot make a trap disarm.

Since he has no way to cheat,
Caesari Sosi will meet defeat.
Sosi soon will learn it hurts
When he gets his just desserts.
It will be your turn soon, Sosi. You'll be standing in front of that safe with the Master watching your every mistake.
Every wrong move you make will jolt you into facing the fact that you can't cheat your way through life.
I'm sure it will come as a shock when you get exactly what you deserve.
Shut up, Conner. You're nothing but another slimy Drat crawling these halls. Lucky for you I have better things to do with my life than fight with Drats.
Don't you have something else to do, Conner?
